title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Chargers head coach Brandon Staley's decision to go for it on 4th down multiple times in their overtime loss to the Chiefs. He compares Patrick Mahomes and Justin Herbert to other great rivalries in sports history and what we can look forward to for the next decade. He also shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 15 of the NFL season. Plus, Packers RB AJ Dillon joins the show to talk about their success this season and what it's like playing with Aaron Rodgers. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
